children.key: Will you agree to not pass on the transaction fee to a customer and make sure the full amount of the transaction fee is covered by your Business?
Will you have other payment methods to give your customers options on how they want to pay for goods and services?
Will you keep records of your customer’s Centrepay payments for up to 2 years and store them securely?
Will you notify us of any changes to your Business or the goods and services you provide?
